A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I never review movies\, but this was just a slap in the face to even the casual star wars fan. 
The story was incredibly flawed. 
The majority of the actions and decisions taken by most of the characters were incoherent.
There are just too many plot holes.
It doesn't line up with previous installments.
Other than the visuals\, this film was a complete waste of time\, money\, talent and a beloved franchise.
